org.workjournal
Class Journal

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.workjournal.Journal
public class Journal
extends java.lang.Object

Journal is a collection of JournalEntry objects. It is persisted in a small database using HypersonicSQL.

Author:
Thornton Rose
See Also:
JournalEntry
